import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory, useLocation } from "react-router"; import { createCategory, updateCategory } from "../../../redux/actions/categorypAction"; import Header from "../HeaderAdmin"; function EditCategoryp() { const nameRef = useRef(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const location = useLocation((state) => state.category); console.log(location.state.category); const history = useHistory(); const submit = () => { const name = nameRef.current.value; dispatch(updateCategory(location.state.category._id, { name })); history.push("/categoriespAdmin"); }; return ( <>
